description technical detail:
Acer 24" LED Monitor with HDMI/DVI Ultra Slim
Everyday series monitors save space and add elegance to any area. A range of classy looks are on offer, from super-thin profiles to blue-lit power buttons, round- to X-shaped bases, and wood-textured detailing to glossy black bezels. Whichever model you choose, youre in for beautiful views.
Youll enjoy tasks and entertainment more with fine details and smooth movement, thanks to high resolutions, fast response times and superior contrast ratios. Games are more exciting and films truly cinematic when visuals are vibrant. Plus, the widescreen aspect ratio frames movies and HDTV content perfectly.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
